member.summary: This interface represents a scroll viewer.

member.summary: Occures when scroll viewer is scrolled.

member.summary: Gets the upper limit of values of scrollable range.

member.summary: Gets the lower limit of values of scrollable range.

member.summary: Gets the large change of scroll box's value.

member.summary: Gets the large change of scroll box's value.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Controls.SearchCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Event args for event.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Controls.SearchCompletedEventArgs.SearchResultItem
member.summary: Gets the search result item found for the search request. If the item is null, then nothing was found.

member.name: P:Apitron.PDF.Controls.SearchCompletedEventArgs.CancelNavigation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether automatic navigation to search result should be canceled.
member.value: true if navigation should be canceled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Apitron.PDF.Controls.PageViewMode
member.summary: Enumeration that defines possible page fit modes for .

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Controls.PageViewMode.Continuous
member.summary: Continuous scolling with zoom factor applied, similar to

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Controls.PageViewMode.PageByPage
member.summary: One page is displayed at once, if page doesn't fit it can be scrolled normally up and down. If it is scrolled too much tha page switches. Similar to .

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Controls.PageViewMode.FitWidth
member.summary: Continuous view, pages are adjusted to fit horizontally and can be scrolled smoothly.

member.name: F:Apitron.PDF.Controls.PageViewMode.FitPage
member.summary: Page by page view, pages are adjusted to fit in both directions, zoom factor may vary from page to page if their dimensions differ. Scrolling works sequentally, page by page.

member.summary: Represents a PDF viewer control that can be used to show PDF documents.

member.summary: Occurs when search activity is being requested. The user should respond to this event and properly set the for the document loaded.
